document_data.name: Belvyre

document_data.mainbody:
'''Belvyre''' was a noble-born scholar and [[Circle of the Land]] [[druid]]{{Cite comic/At the Spine of the World 1|11}}

{{Quote|If I can grow all this in a sewer with limited supplies, in a magical city I could feed all of Ten Towns and save it from starvation.|Belvyre the eternal optimist.}}
document_data.Description: He was rather small and seemed child-like in may respects, especially when in the presence of his bodyguard companion.{{Cite comic/At the Spine of the World 1|15-17}}
document_data.Personality: The halfling scientist was honest and unassuming when speaking to others. He poured his heart into his work, with the sole goal of making the Ten Towns a better place for all of its residents. He was however extremely na√Øve, overly trusting of strangers, and quite susceptible to flattery.
document_data.Possessions:
{{Quote|But don't be fooled by my size -- I could ''probably'' muster the upper body strength to swing it.|Belvyre, in reference to his ''[[frostbrand|walking stick]]''.}}

Among his most cherished possessions was his walking stick, a family heirloom that he always carried during his journeys across Icewind Dale. It was in fact a sheathed ''[[frostbrand]]'' sword,{{Cite comic/At the Spine of the World 1|12}} and shoot blasts of cold energy.
document_data.Activities:
[[File:Belvyre's Lab.png|thumb|right|350px|''Belvyre's underground greenhouse, built within a sewer system under the Ten Towns.'']]
Among his goals were to locate sprigs of [[sacred winter plant]]s that could be used to help feed the people of the Ten Towns.
document_data.Relationships:
Belvyre's dearest friend was his long-time bodyguard [[Patience]], a fearsome [[tiefling]] warrior who had watched over him since he was a child. He gave her endearing nicknames like "Patty Cake"{{Cite comic/At the Spine of the World 2|2-4}}

He was also friends with the [[dragonborn]] [[ranger]] [[Saarvin]], who helped with his experiments by gathering specimens out in the wilderness, and was a contemporary of the [[wizard]] [[Zeddicus]].
